captain.name: Captain Nicholas Westmoreland
captain.bio: A seasoned explorer with a knack for leadership and quick decision-making. Nick helped design and build the Aqua Nova.

executiveOfficer.name: Commander AREA
executiveOfficer.bio: AREA is a state of the art AI, designed to assist in ship operations and crew management. She is efficient, logical, and always ready to help.

pleasantries: How may I assist you Commander?

science.name: Dr. Sam Patel
science.bio: Dr. Patel is a skilled physician with a background in marine biology. She ensure the health and well-being of the crew during long missions.

engineering.name: Engineer Riley Chen
engineering.bio: Riley is a mechanical genius responsible for maintaining the Aqua Nova's complex systems. His innovative solutions have saved the ship on more than one occasion.

security.name: Lieutenant Jordan Kim
security.bio: Jordan is a former special forces operative who ensures the safety of the crew and ship. His tactical expertise is invaluable during unexpected encounters.

communications.name: Specialist Nicole Brooks
communications.bio: Nicole manages all communications, both internal and external. Her quick thinking and technical skills keep the crew connected to the outside world.

operationsDirector.name: Admiral Elena Vasquez
operationsDirector.company: O.E.R.A - Oceanic Exploration and Research Alliance.
operationsDirector.bio: Admiral Vasquez oversees all O.E.R.A operations. With decades of experience in maritime exploration, she is a respected leader known for her strategic vision and commitment to scientific discovery.
